Title: Relates to assisting persons with medically diagnosed HIV infection; repealer
Summary: Relates to assisting persons with medically diagnosed HIV infection.
LawCode: Amd §§131-a & 131, rpld §131-a sub 15, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to assisting persons with medically diagnosed HIV infection; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
